Articles.Content:
Hi I'm new to this forum(s?) and online "talking" in general so I will make some mistakes I bet. Sorry if I do. 

To the topic of KSP I'm a big fan. I love how you can just play how you want, hard core realistic, or silly K.drives. all the while exploring an awsome Soler sistem which can teach you alot about orbital mechanics. Thanks Squade and thanks to the people of these forums for making (being?) such a interesting and diverse community. I hope I'm not to gushy and such for a lot of you.

P.S. who ever invented Kerble emogeys is brilliant! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Hello Planetfall. Welcome to the forum, and to online talking. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) (Be careful about where you talk out there, though. Some of those places are weird.)

What if you talk wrong? Welcome aboard!

grits teeth at spelling, typos, etc. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Yes, k-drives. We need more k-drives!

Glad to have you aboard...and Welcome to the forums! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Cheers,

~Claw

Ha, thanks you guys or gals. Yah I bet some places on the internet are really "weird"!

The stuff I worry about messing up is mostly with the site's UI. It took me awhile to figure out how to reply (well I hope I did) that kind of stuff.

Well it's all a learning experience and relevant in this 

Brave new world.

 Happy launches!

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Yes, k-drives. We need more k-drives!
> Glad to have you aboard...and Welcome to the forums! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> 
> Cheers,
> 
> ~Claw

I've never made one but I think I may soon.

Hail the The Breaker!

> 
> I've never made one but I think I may soon.
> Hail the The Breaker!

Hail Kraken, you heretic! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Welcome aboard!

> 
> Hail Kraken, you heretic! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> Welcome aboard!

No, hear nothing of this post! Your savior will be the NaNo virus!
"Hello Mr NaN." was one of my favorite lines
Welcome to the site, you seem pretty Bad-S! We're happy to have you here, and so are the Kerbals, I'm guessing!

Why thanks Apollo! While Jeb status has yet to be reached in my opinion i'm honored you think so!

I try to be nice with my Kerbles no deaths thus far. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
